Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored five points in the final minute of the game
Brandon Miller called game with a tip shot after Grant Williams missed a game-winning 3-pointer
The Hornets won after getting the advantage in the second quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets improved to 3-5 and are playing better than expected
This result makes them an NBA play-in tournament team alongside the Bulls, Hawks and Magic
Charlotte snapped a three-game skid and will try to extend its good moment against the Pacers on Friday
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball finished with 25 points on 10-from-23 from the field, including 5-from-12 from deep
The Hornets ended the third quarter up 77-76
The third and fourth quarter ended tied at 31 points per team
Others: The Hornets star guard LaMelo Ball bounced back against the Detroit Pistons after a discreet game against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday
